summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'patho', 'pathogen-disease', 'pathogen-disease associations', '3420 pathogen-disease' | Ontology based mining of pathogen-disease associations from literature | Ontology based mined Pathogen-Disease associations | expanded.InfDis.Pairs.pathogen-disease+NPMI.txt contains all the pathogen-disease pairs extracted from literature.
